sentences.english: Shepherd's purse green season, and grandmother would have to accompany her mother to pick the fields shepherd's purse.
sentences.chinese: 荠菜青青时节，外婆便要母亲陪着去田野里挑荠菜。

sentences.english: He died of a stroke, same as Grandma.
sentences.chinese: 和外婆一样，他也是患中风死的。

sentences.english: My grandparents built a bamboo fence around their house.
sentences.chinese: 我的外公外婆在房子周围筑了一道竹篱。

sentences.english: Wolf-grandam stories are in the air all aroud the world.
sentences.chinese: 狼外婆故事是广泛流传于世界各地的故事类型。

sentences.english: Part3: Grandma and wolf in the house.
sentences.chinese: 外婆和老狼在外婆家里。

sentences.english: Part3: Grandma and wolf in the house.
sentences.chinese: 外婆和老狼在外婆家里。

sentences.english: In the evenings I usually read or talked with Grandma.
sentences.chinese: 晚上我一般看看书或和外婆聊聊天。

sentences.english: These earrings remind me of grandma's earrings.
sentences.chinese: 这对耳环让我想起了外婆的耳环。

sentences.english: And in July 2nd , I went to Miaoshi to see my dad and grandma .
sentences.chinese: 第二天，我就去苗市看父亲和外婆。

sentences.english: My grandmother's house in Fenghua, a small village.
sentences.chinese: 我外婆的家里是在奉化的一个小村庄里。

sentences.english: But I do think we could learn a thing or two from our mothers and grandmothers.
sentences.chinese: 但我觉得我们仍可以从妈妈和外婆那里学到些东西。

sentences.english: Nann almost sounds like her old self, "My God, look at her."
sentences.chinese: 外婆的声音象以前一样，“天哪，看她。”

sentences.english: This dog grandma is writing with tears in my eyes.
After the regime was changed, she lost the chance to move south in order to wait for me.
sentences.chinese: 政权易帜，外婆为了等我而失去了南迁的机会。

sentences.english: Haha, I ah, this summer vacation to come back, we see grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，我啊，这次放暑假回来，就来看外婆。

sentences.english: Mum is now back to work in a tourist company and grandma is with Freya at day time.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈开始回到旅游公司上班，白天外婆在家陪菲雅。

definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
